idea-plugin.name: GitViz Horizontal
idea-plugin.description: Shows the Git history horizontally with author, commit message, SHA, tags, and branches.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Version 1.4.1

  • Extended IDE compatibility to support a wider range of versions.

Version 1.3.0

  • Declared IDE compatibility in plugin.xml via <idea-version since-build="242.0"/> for 2024.2+
  • Added Marketplace-compliant plugin icon (pluginIcon.svg) for better listing visuals
  • General stability and documentation improvements

Version 1.2.0

  • Advanced Filtering: New filter bar with branch, tag, author, and commit message search capabilities
  • Auto-Population: Filter dropdowns automatically populate based on repository data
  • Apply & Clear: Easily apply filter criteria or reset all filters with dedicated buttons
  • Performance: Filters applied dynamically during commit collection for better responsiveness

Version 1.1.0

  • Configurable limits for commits (default: 500) and branches (default: 20) displayed
  • Stable lane assignment using branch-based propagation
  • Improved visual clarity with consistent branch coloring

Version 1.0.0

  • Initial release with horizontal Git history visualization
  • Multi-branch support including tags and remote branches
  • Beautiful DAG graph with smooth curved edges
